title: Low-Oil Mixed Veg Sabzi
description: Vegetable sauté curry with only 1 tsp oil.

title: Vegetable Daliya
description: Fiber-rich broken wheat cooked with vegetables using minimal oil.
steps: ["Lightly roast daliya.","Heat 1 tsp oil, add vegetables.","Add daliya and water and cook.","Serve warm."]

title: Low-Oil Grilled Chicken
description: Lean protein-rich dish marinated in spices and grilled.
ingredients: [{"qty":"300g","name":"Chicken breast"},{"qty":"1 tbsp","name":"Lemon juice"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Garlic paste"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Chilli powder"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Oil"}]
steps: ["Marinate chicken with spices and lemon.","Brush 1 tsp oil on top.","Grill for 12–15 minutes.","Serve hot."]

title: Low-Oil Rajma Curry
description: Protein-packed rajma cooked with minimal oil.
steps: ["Boil rajma.","Heat 1 tsp oil with masala.","Add rajma and simmer."]

title: Low-Oil Lemon Rice
description: Tangy and light lemon rice cooked with minimal oil.
ingredients: [{"qty":"2 cups","name":"Cooked rice"},{"qty":"2 tbsp","name":"Lemon juice"},{"qty":"1/2 tsp","name":"Mustard seeds"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Oil"}]
steps: ["Heat 1 tsp oil and add mustard seeds.","Mix in rice, salt and lemon.","Serve."]

title: Low-Oil Tomato Omelette
description: Protein-rich chickpea flour omelette made with minimal oil.
steps: ["Mix batter.","Spread on pan with 1 tsp oil.","Cook both sides."]

title: Low-Oil Fish Fry
description: Spiced fish fillets cooked in an airfryer with minimal oil.
steps: ["Coat fish with spices.","Brush lightly with oil.","Air fry 12 minutes."]

title: Low-Oil Upma
description: Healthy semolina breakfast prepared with minimal oil.
steps: ["Roast rava dry.","Heat 1 tsp oil, sauté onions and vegetables.","Add water and rava slowly.","Cook until thick."]

title: Low-Oil Egg Bhurji
description: Scrambled eggs cooked with onion and tomato using minimal oil.
steps: ["Heat oil, sauté onions.","Add eggs and scramble.","Serve hot."]

title: Moong Dal Khichdi
description: Light, low-oil protein-rich khichdi made with rice and moong dal.
ingredients: [{"qty":"1 cup","name":"Rice"},{"qty":"1 cup","name":"Moong dal"},{"qty":"1/2 tsp","name":"Turmeric"},{"qty":"to taste","name":"Salt"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Oil"}]
steps: ["Wash rice and dal.","Heat 1 tsp oil and sauté turmeric.","Add rice, dal, water and cook.","Serve hot."]

title: Low-Oil Masala Oats
description: Healthy oats cooked with vegetables using only 1 tsp oil.
steps: ["Heat oil and sauté vegetables.","Add oats and water.","Cook to a thick consistency."]

title: Steamed Idli with Low-Oil Chutney
description: Classic steamed idlis served with chutney made in 1 tsp oil.
steps: ["Steam idlis.","Prepare chutney with 1 tsp oil tempering.","Serve."]

title: Tandoori Paneer (Low Oil)
description: Marinated paneer cubes air-fried with almost no oil.

title: Low-Oil Chole
description: Classic Punjabi chickpea curry prepared with just 1 tsp of oil.
ingredients: [{"qty":"1 cup","name":"Chickpeas"},{"qty":"1 tbsp","name":"Chole masala"},{"qty":"1/2 cup","name":"Tomato puree"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Oil"}]
steps: ["Cook chickpeas.","Heat 1 tsp oil, add masala and tomatoes.","Mix chickpeas and simmer."]

title: Sprout Salad
steps: ["Mix sprouts with vegetables.","Add lemon, salt, pepper.","Serve fresh."]

title: Low-Oil Poha
description: A light and healthy Indian breakfast made with flattened rice.
ingredients: [{"qty":"2 cups","name":"Poha"},{"qty":"1 chopped","name":"Onion"},{"qty":"1 chopped","name":"Green chilli"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Mustard seeds"},{"qty":"1/2 tsp","name":"Turmeric"},{"qty":"1 tsp","name":"Oil"}]
steps: ["Wash poha lightly and drain.","Heat 1 tsp oil, add mustard seeds and onions.","Add turmeric, poha, salt, and mix.","Cook 3 minutes and serve."]
